title: IT Security Guidelines
text:
**1. Password Rules**  
Passwords must contain at least 12 characters and be changed every 180 days. Multi-factor authentication is mandatory.

title: IT Security Guidelines
text:
**2. Device Usage**  
Company devices may only be used for business purposes. Lost or stolen devices must be reported immediately.

title: IT Security Guidelines
text:
**3. Data Protection**  
Confidential data must not be stored on personal devices or shared via unauthorized channels.

title: IT Security Guidelines
text:
**4. Incident Reporting**  
Security incidents must be reported to the IT security team within 24 hours.

title: Remote Work Policy
text:
**1. Eligibility**  
Employees may work remotely up to three days per week, subject to manager approval.

title: Remote Work Policy
text:
**2. Equipment**  
Schaefer Corporation provides a laptop and optional monitor. Employees are responsible for a stable internet connection.

title: Remote Work Policy
text:
**3. Working From Abroad**  
Remote work from abroad is permitted for up to 20 days per year. All data-protection rules remain fully applicable.

title: Remote Work Policy
text:
**4. Availability**  
During working hours, employees must remain reachable via Slack and email.

title: Travel & Expense Guidelines
text:
**1. Booking Travel**  
Business trips must be booked through the approved travel portal. Economy class is standard for flights under six hours.

title: Travel & Expense Guidelines
text:
**2. Accommodation**  
Hotel expenses are reimbursed up to 120 EUR per night, including taxes.

title: Travel & Expense Guidelines
text:
**3. Meals**  
Per-diem allowances follow local regulations. Receipts must be uploaded within ten days after the trip.

title: Travel & Expense Guidelines
text:
**4. Reimbursement Process**  
Expenses are submitted via the HR portal and typically reimbursed within 14 days.

title: Vacation Policy
text:
**1. Annual Leave Entitlement**  
Employees receive 25 days of paid vacation per year. Leave is accrued monthly during the first year.

title: Vacation Policy
text:
**2. Request Procedure**  
Vacation requests must be submitted via the HR portal at least two weeks in advance. Approval is subject to team workload and staffing requirements.

title: Vacation Policy
text:
**3. Carryover Rules**  
Up to 5 unused days may be carried over into the next calendar year and must be used by March 31.

title: Vacation Policy
text:
**4. Special Leave**  
Special leave may be granted for personal events such as marriage, relocation, or family emergencies.
